sentence.Network_en: His sense of humour allowed him to face adversaries with equanimity..
sentence.Network_cn: .他的幽默感让他能够平静地面对对手。

sentence.Network_en: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity .
sentence.Network_cn: 她心情平静地接受了动手术的可能性。

sentence.Network_en: She went again, and in so doing temporarily recovered her equanimity.
sentence.Network_cn: 她又去看了戏, 而且这样一来又暂时恢复了她的平静.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... animus n. 敌意，憎恨 equanimity n. 沉着，镇定 annals n. 纪年表，年鉴，年报.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... unanimous 意见一致的 equanimity 平静；沉着 animosity 憎恨，憎恶.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... equator n 赤道 equanimity n 镇静，沉着 equilibrium n 平衡，均势.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... equator n 赤道 equanimity n 镇静，沉着 equilibrium n 平衡，均势.

list.abs: it is wonderful when there is equanimity between different races ., 不同种族之间和平相处 , 真是好极了.
Edward a model of good temper and his equanimity imperturbable ., 爱德华是个典型的好性子 , 他总是沉着镇定.
相关短语with equanimity 平静地,泰然单词词根
fretfulconciliation使苦恼安慰fretfuldisplaying equanimity易怒的表现平静fretfulkeep 烦恼的保持平静@安慰的

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (also in the sense 'fairness, impartiality'): from Latin aequanimitas, from aequus 'equal' + animus 'mind'

entry.def: Equanimity is a calm state of mind and attitude to life, so that you never lose your temper or become upset.

example.ex: His sense of humour allowed him to face adversaries with equanimity...
example.tran: 他的幽默感让他能够平静地面对对手。

example.ex: The defeat was taken with equanimity by the leadership.
example.tran: 领导层坦然地接受了失败。

sentences.sentence: "he accepted their problems with composure and she with equanimity"

auth_sentence.content: Clarisse responded to each accusation with equanimity and patience.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clarisse responded to each accusation with equanimity and patience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clarisse responded to each accusation with equanimity and patience.

auth_sentence.content: He faced adverse criticism with an equanimity which astonished me.
auth_sentence.res_content: He faced adverse criticism with an equanimity which astonished me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He faced adverse criticism with an equanimity which astonished me.

auth_sentence.content: I refused to be...impressed...but such equanimity was difficult to achieve.
auth_sentence.res_content: I refused to be...impressed...but such equanimity was difficult to achieve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I refused to be...impressed...but such equanimity was difficult to achieve.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强+equ相等,平均+ate……的→和所需的趋向相等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 稳定的,不变的,[脾气]温和的
stems_affixes.word_buile: equ相等,平均+able……的→[心情]能稳定的
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
ad加强+equ相等,平均+acy状态→[数量]已经加到相等了→够了
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal[adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于]+ity表名词→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
equate[v.同等看待,使相等]+ion表名词→n.[数学]等式,方程式;[with]相等;均衡
equ相等,平均+ity表名词→n.公平,公正
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
equ相等,平均+ate表动词→v.同等看待,使相等
in无+anim生命,精神+ate……的→adj.无生命的
long长+anim生命+ous……的→生命耐久→忍耐的
magn大+anim生命+ous……的→大生命→心胸博大
un=uni一个+anim生命+ous……的→[大家]同一个生命→一致的
anim生命,精神+al物→有生命的东西→动物
animate[v.使有生气,活泼]+ion动作或状态→animation生动;动画
anim生命,精神+osity多……的状态→生命太多→由爱变恨→仇恨
anim恨+us→n.憎恨
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静
anim恨+ad+vert转→转向恨→谴责
anim生命,精神+ate使→使有生命
